A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 8.0/10\n\nWhile The Last Jedi would probably be in my bottom 3 as far as Star Wars movies go (real Star Wars movies\, not spin offs\, cartoons) it was not as nearly as bad as the angry nerds made it out to be. The first half of the movie was tedious\, but the ending and the emergence of Rey made up for it.
